property_search.name: Property Search
property_search.description: Advanced search functionality to find properties based on location, price, features, and more.
property_search.how_to_use: Enter your search criteria in the search bar at the top of the homepage. You can filter by location, price range, number of bedrooms, property type, and more.

ai_powered_matching.name: AI-Powered Property Matching
ai_powered_matching.description: Our intelligent algorithms match properties with the right buyers, optimizing your selling potential.
ai_powered_matching.how_to_use: When you list your property, our AI automatically matches it with potential buyers based on their preferences and search history.

virtual_viewings.name: Virtual Viewings
virtual_viewings.description: View properties remotely through 3D tours, video walkthroughs, and live video calls.
virtual_viewings.how_to_use: On a property listing page, click the 'Virtual Viewing' button to access 3D tours or schedule a live video viewing with our AI assistant.
features: Guided virtual viewings with AI assistant

offer_submission.name: Offer Submission
offer_submission.description: Submit and negotiate offers directly through the platform without an estate agent.
offer_submission.how_to_use: On a property listing page, click 'Make an Offer' to submit your offer. You can include conditions and proof of funds.
features: Document upload for proof of funds

property_listing.name: Property Listing
property_listing.description: List your property for sale with professional photos, detailed descriptions, and virtual tours.
property_listing.how_to_use: Click 'Sell Your Home' on the homepage, then follow the step-by-step guide to create your listing.
features: Automatic price suggestion based on market data

transaction_management.name: Transaction Management
transaction_management.description: Manage the entire sale process from offer acceptance to completion.
transaction_management.how_to_use: Once an offer is accepted, access the 'Transaction Hub' from your dashboard to track progress and complete required steps.

ai_assistant.name: 24/7 AI Assistant
ai_assistant.description: Get instant answers to questions from both buyers and sellers, streamlining the entire process.
ai_assistant.how_to_use: Click the chat icon in the bottom right corner of any page to start a conversation with the AI assistant.
features: Process guidance for buyers and sellers

smart_document_management.name: Smart Document Management
smart_document_management.description: Securely manage all property documents, from listings to offers, in one centralized place.
smart_document_management.how_to_use: Access your document library from your dashboard to upload, view, and share important property documents.

real_time_analytics.name: Real-Time Analytics
real_time_analytics.description: Track property views, interested buyers, and market trends to optimize your listing strategy.
real_time_analytics.how_to_use: View your property analytics dashboard to see performance metrics and insights about your listing.

automated_viewing_management.name: Automated Viewing Management
automated_viewing_management.description: Efficiently manage viewing requests and track potential buyer interest with our automated system.
automated_viewing_management.how_to_use: Set your availability in the calendar, and the system will automatically schedule viewings based on buyer requests.

offer_management.name: Offer Management
offer_management.description: Compare and analyze multiple offers with AI-powered insights to make informed decisions.
offer_management.how_to_use: View all offers in your dashboard to compare terms, conditions, and buyer qualifications side by side.

price_intelligence.name: Price Intelligence
price_intelligence.description: Get AI-driven price recommendations based on market data and property features.
price_intelligence.how_to_use: When listing your property, our system will suggest an optimal price range based on comparable properties and current market conditions.

secure_process.name: Secure Process
secure_process.description: End-to-end security for all property transactions, documents, and communications.
secure_process.how_to_use: All interactions on the platform are encrypted and secure, with verification steps for sensitive actions.

property_performance.name: Property Performance
property_performance.description: Monitor listing performance, viewer demographics, and engagement metrics in real-time.
property_performance.how_to_use: Access the performance dashboard from your property listing to view detailed analytics about your property's market performance.

customer_support.name: Customer Support
customer_support.description: Get help with any questions or issues you may have while using the MaiSON platform.
customer_support.how_to_use: Visit our Contact page at https://www.maisonai.co.uk/contact or use one of our direct contact methods.

email.label: Email
email.description: Send us an email for any inquiries or support needs.

phone.label: Phone
phone.description: Call our support team during business hours.

contact_form.description: Fill out our contact form on the website with your Name, Email, Subject, and Message, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
